entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:07 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 07:54 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Fog dissipating. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023
